mapper.select: select campdetail.campdetail_id, campdetail.camp_id, campdetail.detail_name, campdetail.price, campdetail.photo_url from campdetail join campground on campdetail.camp_id = campground.camp_id where campground.camp_id = #{camp_id};

select campdetail.campdetail_id, campdetail.camp_id, campdetail.detail_name, campdetail.price, campdetail.photo_url from campdetail join campground on campdetail.camp_id = campground.camp_id where campground.camp_id = #{camp_id} AND campdetail.campdetail_id = #{campdetail_id};
